Coding while being sick
partialText:
<p>&lt; I have been sick, for 3 days and it has not been fun. When your not sick, you take for granted how nice it is but when you are, boy you know my pain right now. I have not been able to code for like 2 days not only because I am sick but also because of the parades here witch normally I would not go to when I am sick but I isn't that bad of a sickness and I had family over.<br>
 But anyway when your sick, get some rest or you might get burnout and you aren't going to have as good Ideas as you would when your not sick. Thanks for reading, Ill probably be fine tomorrow and be back to coding but till then have a great rest of your day.</p>
